sentences.en: ...the crumbling stonework of the derelict church.
sentences.cn: ...废弃的教堂摇摇欲坠的石造部分。

sentences.en: Architecture An ornamental device , as in stonework or weaving , consisting of stylized vine leaves and tendrils.
sentences.cn: [建筑学]螺层:一种含有很风格化的藤叶和卷须的装饰结构, 如石制品或纺织品上.

sentences.en: Close inspection shows up the cracks in the stonework.
sentences.cn: 仔细观察就能发现这石雕中有裂缝.

sentences.en: I scuffed the heel of my shoe on the stonework.
sentences.cn: 我的鞋跟儿给铺好的石头磨坏了。

sentences.en: Plants can also break up stonework. Tree roots have cracked this statue of Khmer god.
sentences.cn: 植物也能瓦解石器,图中的高棉石雕神像被树根生长力所分裂.

sentences.en: Reconstructed Incan terraces and buildings show the skilled stonework for which the ancient people are celebrated.
sentences.cn: 秘鲁图片集.重建的印加梯田和建筑物显示熟练的技术的石匠,其中古代人是著名的.

sentences.en: The simplest stonework is rubBle, roughly Broken stones Bound in mortar.
sentences.cn: 最简单的石料加工品是粗石, 在研磨机中粗略地破碎的石头.

sentences.en: The stonework of the tower was crumbling, and the great clock had fallen disrepair.
sentences.cn: 钟楼的石头框架摇摇欲坠, 那座大钟也已年久失修.

sentences.en: The stonework of the tower was crumbling, and the great clock had fallen into disrepair.
sentences.cn: 这座高塔的石建部分已经开始瓦解, 而那座大钟早已长久失修了.

sentences.en: The stonework stands out from the rest of the wall.

trans.tran_cn: 石雕工艺，做石工的场所，凿石工程
